company.description: Edu Calvo | UI Designer & Frontend Developer
company.longDescription: Passionate UI designer and frontend developer with 8+ years of experience crafting digital experiences that blend aesthetics with functionality. I specialize in creating intuitive interfaces, responsive designs, and modern web applications that drive user engagement and business growth.
company.detailedDescription: I transform complex ideas into elegant, user-centered digital solutions. My approach combines strategic design thinking with technical expertise, ensuring every project delivers both visual impact and seamless functionality. From concept to deployment, I work closely with clients to understand their goals and create solutions that exceed expectations.
company.footerText: Based in Madrid, Spain. Collaborating with innovative companies worldwide to build exceptional digital experiences.

experience.description: Leading design and development initiatives for digital products, creating scalable design systems and implementing modern frontend architectures.
Designed and developed user-centered digital solutions, focusing on brand identity and user experience optimization.
Created visual identities and web solutions for diverse clients, building expertise in both design and development workflows.
Developed corporate communications and digital assets, gaining experience in enterprise-level design requirements.

testimonials.text: Edu's attention to detail and technical expertise transformed our vision into a stunning, functional reality.
